charinfo.name: Yamanaka Inoichi
charinfo.description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Yamanaka clan, and the father of Ino, Inoichi is a very calm, analytical man who can solve nearly any dilemma. While fighting, Inoichi much prefers targeting an enemy's mind, tearing it apart while remaining unscratched himself.

abilities.name: Psycho Mind Transmission
abilities.description: Inoichi forcibly enters one enemy's mind, dealing 20 damage to them for 2 turns. The following 2 turns that enemy will be unable to use any counter or reflect skills. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

abilities.name: Sensing Water Sphere
abilities.description: Inoichi begins gather data of the battlefield. Each time any enemy uses a new harmful skill, this skill will gain a stack and Inoichi will heal 10 health. During this time, Inoichi can use this skill again for 1 random to instead gain 1 random chakra for each stack on it and this skill will end.

abilities.name: Mental Invasion
abilities.description: Inoichi exposes one enemy's mind. For 4 turns, all invulnerability skills that enemy uses will last 1 less turn. The following 4 turns each time a new harmful mental skill is used on that enemy, the user of that skill will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Mobile Barrier
abilities.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Inoichi invulnerable for 1 turn.
